known_issues: Image preview still does not close as expected (bug persists after deployment)

existing_features.title: Fix the fullscreen image preview overlay so it can always be dismissed when viewing an attached image: (a) clicking the preview close (X) button must close the fullscreen preview, and (b) clicking the backdrop/outside the image must close the fullscreen preview.

Ensure the fullscreen image preview overlay is the topmost interactive layer while open, so pointer/click events reach the fullscreen preview close controls (i.e., underlying Dialog/overlays must not intercept clicks intended for the fullscreen preview).

Verify and keep correct keyboard dismissal behavior: pressing Escape while the fullscreen image preview is open must close only the fullscreen preview overlay and must not close the underlying NoteDetailModal.

projectName: Fix fullscreen image preview dismissal bug (close button and backdrop click)
